Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near63rd/Hayes
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd  buses are temporarily rerouted via Hayes, Lake Shore, Marquette, Stony Island, 64th and Black Stone: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Hayes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
